Description.Name: Who Goes There
Description.Details:
You and Darius are sitting quietly in a bar adjacent to the local hiring hall on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] when [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] returns with everyone’s drinks, a big smile on {SCN_MW.Det} face, “What gives, [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]?” you ask. 
[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] looks like a groupie at an UrbanMech Convention, “Commander, you will never guess who is sitting on the other side of the bar!”

Feigning disinterest, you take a big sip of your drink, “Need a bit more information than that, Mechwarrior.”

{SCN_MW.Subj_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:sit|Default:sits} down, still looking back across the bar, “Khan Darkan K’Haos!”

Your blank look tells everyone you haven’t kept up with the who’s who of clan society.  Darius speaks up on your behalf, “The Khan of Clan Ghost Bear?”

[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] beams, “Yes!! I’d bet my last C-Bill it’s him!!  I wonder why he’s here and not in clan space?”

You jokingly respond, “On holiday most likely.  I can imagine a chance to get away from all the headaches of being a khan would be a welcomed respite.”

Darius looks over to the table where Khan Darkan K’Haos is sitting, “Well, he appears to be alone with none of his entourage in sight.  Maybe he is on holiday, as you suggest.”

[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] speaks up, “Maybe… maybe he wants to hire on with a mercenary company?  Why else would he be here at a bar run by the MRBC?”

Darius looks at you, “You know Commander, if [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] is right, he’d be a great asset for us.”

Description.Name: Not at this time
Description.Details:
You ponder the options before you for a moment before making your decision, “Look [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], I get that you’re a bit infatuated with clanners, and yes, I could potentially see the merits in having someone of that stature within our company. But it just isn’t a good fit for us right now.”

[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] pleads, “Commander please!  We could learn so much from one of the legendary Khans of Ghost Bear history!”

Your face turns steely, “I said no and I mean it.  Perhaps another day may shed different light on things but for now, we continue operating with the crew we have.”

[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] tries to beg once more when Darius intervenes, “The Commander has said no.  Drop it now or I’ll assign you to latrine duty.”

Description.Name: Offer spare bunk to Darkan K'Haos
Hire DK
Description.Details:
You down the last of your drink, steeling up the nerve to go and speak to a man that has commanded a thousand times over more people than you would ever dream of, “Ok, I’ll go see if they are actually here looking to hire on to a company.”

You notice the looks of other patrons towards the Khan sitting alone at his table: Anger, Contempt, Intrigue, Awe… the list goes on and on but no one other than you and the bar staff seem willing to approach.
 
As you arrive at the Khan’s table, he smiles, and gestures for you to sit, not even concerned with the reason for you approaching.  Before you can say anything, Khan Darkan K’Haos slides a tankard across to you, “You are curious as to why I am here and not with my clan, quiaff?”

The clan dialect distracts you for a moment, as does the fact that this man seated, can still look you straight in the eyes without inclining his head when you are still standing. You sit down, now forced to look up to meet his gaze, “Um, well, yes. It does come across as odd that you would be in a bar for mechwarriors looking for employment.”

The Khan smiles, “Suffice it to say that I needed a break from my duties as Khan of Clan Ghost Bear.  I still yearn for the cockpit of a mech and the roar of battle around me, so I thought to find a company I could loan myself out to that would scratch that itch. This is such a place and you are here to ask me to join your group, quiaff?”

You nod, “Yes, I would be interested in having you as a member of my company.”

The Khan downs his drink, “Convince me that your company is worthy, Commander…”

“Commander {Commander.FirstName} {Commander.LastName}”, you respond. 

Over the next couple of hours, and many tankards of local ale, you and the Khan discuss the nuances of running a company versus being a Khan of a Clan.  Towards the end of the evening, Khan Darkan K’Haos extends his hand to you, “Commander {Commander.FirstName} {Commander.LastName}, your vision appears aligned with my own.  I will join you and your company. Bargained well and done!”

<color=#f69c24>Hiring fee for Darkan K'Haos has been deducted from your account

Darkan K'Haos is now in your barracks</color>
